name: ORS Prisoners with Disabilities Details
description:
This report display details of any disabilities a prisoner has and any treatment. The report prompts for one, multiple or All Establishment Codes and one, multiple or all disabilities.
Now allows Multiple establishments to be selected.
PDD0024 - v1.5 Last Modified: 07/11/18

dataset.name: Disability Details
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION, AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY AS OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER.LAST_NAME AS LAST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER.FIRST_NAME AS FIRST_NAME, SUBSTR(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION, LENGTH(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.AGY_LOC_ID) + 2, LENGTH(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION)) AS UNIT_DESCRIPTION_4_SHORT, AT_HLTH_PRB_DISAB_DSC.DESCRIPTION AS DISABILITY, AT_TREATMENT.DESCRIPTION AS ADJUSTMENT_TYPE, AT_ADJUSTMENT_AGENCY_LOCATIONS.DESCRIPTION AS ADJUSTMENT_ESTABLISHMENT, AT_OFFENDER_MEDICAL_TREATMENTS.START_DATE AS START_DATE, AT_OFFENDER_MEDICAL_TREATMENTS.COMMENT_TEXT AS COMMENT_TEXT FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATIONS AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4, OMS_OWNER.REFERENCE_CODES AT_HLTH_PRB_DISAB_DSC, OMS_OWNER.REFERENCE_CODES AT_TREATMENT, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_ADJUSTMENT_AGENCY_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_WING_ESTABLISHMENT, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_HEALTH_PROBLEMS AT_OFFENDER_HEALTH, OMS_OWNER.CASELOAD_AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS WING_CASELOAD_SECURITY, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_MEDICAL_TREATMENTS AT_OFFENDER_MEDICAL_TREATMENTS WHERE (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_ID = AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.INTERNAL_LOCATION_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER(SELECT username from context_)) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('OUT', 'TRN') AND NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.CASELOAD_ID IN ('ADMINC', 'CADM_I', 'MULTI')) AND (AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_WING_ESTABLISHMENT.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_WING_ESTABLISHMENT.AGY_LOC_ID = WING_CASELOAD_SECURITY.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = AT_OFFENDER_HEALTH.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (AT_HLTH_PRB_DISAB_DSC.DOMAIN = 'HEALTH_PBLM') AND (AT_OFFENDER_HEALTH.PROBLEM_CODE = AT_HLTH_PRB_DISAB_DSC.CODE) AND (AT_OFFENDER_HEALTH.OFFENDER_HEALTH_PROBLEM_ID = AT_OFFENDER_MEDICAL_TREATMENTS.OFFENDER_HEALTH_PROBLEM_ID (+)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_MEDICAL_TREATMENTS.TREATMENT_CODE = AT_TREATMENT.CODE (+)) AND (AT_TREATMENT.DOMAIN (+) = 'HEALTH_TREAT') AND (AT_OFFENDER_MEDICAL_TREATMENTS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_ADJUSTMENT_AGENCY_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER(SELECT username from context_)) AND (WING_CASELOAD_SECURITY.USERNAME = UPPER(SELECT username from context_)) AND (NOT AT_HLTH_PRB_DISAB_DSC.CODE IN ('ND', 'NR', 'RD', 'PRD') AND AT_HLTH_PRB_DISAB_DSC.PARENT_CODE = 'DISAB' AND AT_HLTH_PRB_DISAB_DSC.DOMAIN = 'HEALTH_PBLM') AND ((AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID =(SELECT establishment_code from prompt_) OR 'All'=(SELECT establishment_code from prompt_)) AND AT_OFFENDER_HEALTH.PROBLEM_TYPE = 'DISAB' AND AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y' AND AT_OFFENDER_HEALTH.PROBLEM_STATUS = 'ON' AND ((AT_HLTH_PRB_DISAB_DSC.DESCRIPTION IN ('All') OR 'All' IN ('All'))))), dataset_ AS (SELECT DESCRIPTION, OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, LAST_NAME, FIRST_NAME, UNIT_DESCRIPTION_4_SHORT, DISABILITY, ADJUSTMENT_TYPE, ADJUSTMENT_ESTABLISHMENT, START_DATE, COMMENT_TEXT FROM dataset_base_)

report.name: Prisoners with Disability Details - By Last Name
